channel.title: Simple 562 help needed
channel.description:
ok guys im looking for some fast help, im an ametuer working on an atomicscape 562 client. i have it up and running and have a webclient through google.com
here are my questions:
1) when i make myself admin, all the commands dont work anymore, it says "use the reverse apostraphe key (`) to open the console to enter that command. it is usually located under the esc key". it only does this when you are admin/owner of the server, when you are regular player the player only commands work fine, but when admin/owner none of the commands work, admin or normal ones. Any1 got any advice?
2) how to i make a client to put on my site for my players to download so they dont have to use the desktop?

item.title: Simple 562 help needed
item.dc:creator: @rigorous rigorous
item.description:
@rigorous wrote:

ok guys im looking for some fast help, im an ametuer working on an atomicscape 562 client. i have it up and running and have a webclient through google.com

Any1 got any advice?
